701859f-a.title: Bronx: Starlight Park.
701859f-a.text:
Active Atheism
These huge caricatures of the Church E Czzarisa, aade by New York Communists, are Iike those constantly used in

These grotesque :igures aay have maant a great deal to real gron- u p r e d s at ameeting in Starlight Park, th Bronx, in New York City, Karch 16th, 1933, but they were jist aaising boys to the youngsters gathered about them. Ihe figure at left represents the Church - (iasputin, the Black Honk) and at right is Iperialism in figure of Hicholas - Czar of all the Russians.

701861f-a.title: Bronx: Starlight Amusement Park.
701861f-a.text:
Starlight Amusement Park (Bronx): The south end of the park showing the swimming pool and reservoir, seen from the E. 174th Street bridge over the Bronx River. The entrance to the park is on the south side of E. 177th Street, at Devoe
Avende.
July 116, 1928
Views 1, 2
P. L. Sperr

701860f-a.title: Bronx: Starlight Amusement Park.
701860f-a.text:
Starlight Amusement Park (Bronx): Viewing east across the Bronx
